headline.main: NAZI TROOPS MASS AT BORDER POINTS; Fast Units Sent to Southwest Banat, Opposite Yugoslavia -- Others in South Hungary BELGRADE IS PREPARING Planes Fly Over Capital All Day -- Foreign Aircraft Seen at Two Points in Country

lead_paragraph: BELGRADE, Yugoslavia, April 2 -- The general impression among diplomatic and government circles today was that Yugoslavia would be forced into the war, and tonight it was feared this might be imminent.
